plot: Officers Nolan and Harper investigate a murder which may have national security implications, while Officer Bradford must confront his past when he crosses paths with a homeless veteran.

Tim has passed his sergeant exam, but may have to wait endlessly for actual promotion unless he accepts a transfer. War veteran Tim finds the prime suspect of the murder on a fellow homeless squatter a former Marines front platoon member, feeling responsible for his amputated limb. The team follows the trail to a counterfeit money case, then refuses to desist as demanded by federal agents, whose brass-covered covert operation they confront at utter career peril, calling a marker to access the top secret joint Californian crime fighters database.—KGF Vissers
